name: The Pond (Funeral Pyre Games)
description:
I started my third year of computer science in high school, where we are starting to learn game development in Unity. This is my first project for the class.

It is a short narrative adventure game that can best be described as a collection of fetch quests. Your goal is to enter the town and find the way to the pond. You'll meet a variety of well written characters who will help you on your journey. 

This is my first game, so please enjoy it 👉🥺👈

Or else 😏😈😳

Source Code

https://github.com/FuneralPyreGames/The-Pond

Controls

Arrow Keys- Move player

Mouse- Navigate menus

Space bar- Advance dialogue
